name: PSP 2 Pack - MotorStorm Arctic Edge & Twisted Metal: Head-On
name_original: PSP 2 Pack - MotorStorm Arctic Edge & Twisted Metal: Head-On
description:
Bring home two best-selling PSP games - MotorStorm® Arctic Edge and Twisted Metal®: Head On together for one low cost!

MotorStorm®'s breakneck racing festival moves to the unpredictable terrains and harsh temperatures of Alaska. In true MotorStorm® style, players will throw traditional offroad driving and caution to the wind where the ultimate goal in the festival is to not only win, but to survive.

Twisted Metal®: Head-On puts you behind the wheel of one of 14 destructive vehicles, each equipped with machine guns, turbo boost, and a unique special attack. Once you select a vehicle, you can take out your road rage on opponents in 12 wild arenas.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time fee for downloads to up to two systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

Twisted Metal is a registered trademark and Twisted Metal: Head-On is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. © 2005 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. MotorStorm is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. © 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.

For wireless play, this game may not be compatible with the UMD disc version of the game.
